channel.title: Isoflavonoid Biosynthesis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Isoflavonoid Biosynthesis on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaMYB39
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB39 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor CaMYB39 orchestrates surface phenylpropanoid metabolism and pathogen resistance in chickpea.

item.title: GmBBX4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G058900 Gene Symbol: GmBBX4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The GmSTF1/2–GmBBX4 negative feedback loop acts downstream of blue-light photoreceptors to regulate isoflavonoid biosynthesis in soybean.

item.title: GmbZIP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.15g014800 Gene Symbol: GmbZIP5 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A combinatorial action of GmMYB176 and GmbZIP5 controls isoflavonoid biosynthesis in soybean.

item.title: GmCRY1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G101500 Gene Symbol: GmCRY1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Blue light receptors GmCRY1s, GmCRY2s, GmPHOT1s, GmPHOT2s and transcription factor GmSTFs promote the biosynthesis of soybean isoflavones.

item.title: GmMYB176
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05g032200 Gene Symbol: GmMYB176 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor MYB176 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A combinatorial action of GmMYB176 and GmbZIP5 controls isoflavonoid biosynthesis in soybean.

item.title: GmPAL2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G058200 Gene Symbol: GmPAL2.1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSTFs directly bind to the promoter regions of isoflavone synthesis-related genes, such as phenylalanine ammoniases GmPAL2.

item.title: GmUGT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmUGT4 Gene Name: isoflavone 7-O-glucosyltransferase UGT4 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmUGT4 was expressed in the roots (mainly in lateral roots) of the 7-day-old seedlings and seeds, both of which contained abundant amounts of isoflavone conjugates.
